Articles.Content: It would be nice to be able to toggle the thrust limiter, on/off or throttle it up/down it would be very useful on landers for example.
Do you mean binding the thrust limiter setting to an action key? because the thrust limiter setting is available in flight from the menu options when right-clicking on an engine.

I mean being able to toggle it on/off, thrust limiter on; 6% thrust; thrust limiter off, full thrust. For example. That way you could have full thrust for braking, and partial for landing.

It's not such a big deal with single engines, but when you have multiples it is much hard to reset the limiter in flight.
I agree i would be nice but not crucial
